short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Qoos within your CRM to get tactical advice and assist with deal progression.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Qoos is the only platform designed to: 
 
1. Convert your entire library of sales training and methodology into highly practical, bite-sized micro actions, and 
 
2. Deliver those actions directly within the flow of work through a simple, elegant, powerful user interface. 
 
All supported by cutting-edge guidance from leading experts and interactive AI coaching. 
 
Designed by world-class sales experts Brent Adamson, co-author of the The Challenger Sale, and Graham Hawkins, founder of Sales Tribe, Qoos is built on a deep understanding of adult learning theory. 
 
Qoos isn’t a learning tool, it’s an action guide.  It provides sellers concrete prompts to assess deal quality and advance opportunities step-by-step to a positive purchase decision.   
 
All inside a seller’s CRM and current work environment. 
 
Qoos features: 
1. A simple, configurable deal qualification framework, embedded with coaching. 
 
2. Personalized stakeholder profiles featuring step-by-step guidance to navigate complex buying centers with ease. 
 
3. On-demand actions giving sellers the practical guidance they need when they need it most. 
 
Stop guessing your way through a deal.  Qualify opportunities accurately, navigate sales effectively, and close deals more predictably.   
 
Get Qoos.
